item.description: Lecture by Palmira Brummett, Visiting Professor of History, Brown University. Professor Brummett is a historian of the Ottoman Empire and the Mediterranean world whose work focuses on the rhetoric's and genres of cross-cultural encounter. Current projects include completing a monograph on early modern mapping of the Ottoman Empire in text and image, and launching another on the flow of culture, information and people in the early modern Ottoman Adriatic

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Lecture on history of Ottoman Empire and Mediterranean
